availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel William Fogle (Harrison and Pendleton County; Union private)

body.p: Harrison and Pendleton County farmer and Union private. Kentucky native. Married Mahala Asbury Fogle. Private in Company G, Fortieth Regiment, Kentucky Infantry, USA.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1315. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 119. Organization Index to Pension Files of Veterans who served between 1861 and 1900, Civil War Pensions Index, roll no. 167. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 4. “Daniel Fogle,” Find A Grave, January 10, 2013, Memorial no. 103394409.
